Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: waitress was very nice but the food was not. steak was undercooked badly and made me sick. chef may have just had a bad night but the creative choices put into each plate was overwhelming to look at.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Absolutely wonderful, let me start by saying that my to-go order had freshly grated parm!!  From Veronica making deliciously dangerous drinks and great conversationalist,  to Roland, the attentive and kind manager.  Thank you for the ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Probably the best artichoke hearts I‚Äôve ever had. The service and the food were excellent! This place is family owned and run and their giving their best!

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Amazing restaurant next door to Maddaloni Jewelers! They have 2 dishes that are always great here "Chicken Piccolo" and Their "Salmon Marsala" Dish with the potatoes cooked with shrimp and purple sauce your pour over the mix. well seasoned and great food and drinks. Always consistent and recommended

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Went there for Valentine's Day Was a little disappointed. No special menu I had the bronnize And vegetables was way too oily didn't even finish it throughout the  Left over.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Have never had a bad meal here and I keep coming back for more.   Roland the owner is very hands on and takes personal pride and it shows.  He wants all of his customers to be satisfied with every aspect of the restaurant experience.   I have recommended this place to many and haven't heard a complaint.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Nice Italian restaurant with decent food and silent environment. Definitely worth a try.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Absolutely incredible food and drinks . This is my go to spot. Mussels are incredible, they are in a sweet chili broth made with San marzano tomato, pancetta, onions and fresh herbs. The baked clams , short rib meatballs for second course , and lastly the stuffed Veal Chop Valdastona. Done . Always amazing . This is a must go to .

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Double cut pork chop always delivers. Artichoke app is unreal, and I don't care for artichokes.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Alex, wonderful server. Food was really good but, kitchen was running extremely late on getting the orders out. Dessert should have been on them!

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: One dish was better than the next. The parpadel bolonase was the best I've ever tasted. It was a hard dish to follow however the seared scallops with risotto was ridiculous as was the chicken picolo mundo. Highly recommended.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: The only thing better than the service was the food. Our waiter Alex was attentive, polite and timed the serving of every part of our dinner from appetizers to dessert.  The cocktail, The Messenger, was fantastic.  We will be coming back with friends in the near future.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: We sat outside where our table was on a slant, so that was our first issue.  The service was horrible,  slow, and non existant.   Evidently our waitress brought out the wrong drinks. We waited 75 minutes for our food to be delivered.   My ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: This is absolutely the best lobster ravioli I have a had in my entire life! The service was amazing, the food presentation was amazing. The photo I took was after I devoured half the dish!

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Despite the long wait for our table which we made a reservation for Long Idland Restaurant  week, the food was not disappointing. The service was mediocre but they were definitely over booked and under staffed. The food was amazing and ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text:
This was such a dining treat.
Delicious food plate after plate after plate !! Compliments to the chef !! Our server Yanni was the sweetest lady.
We give it 2üëç!!!!

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text:
The food was delicious. Had the sea bass. The calamari was so tender.
Loved the octopus appetizer. Will go back

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: We went there Sunday. I've lived here for many many years and I have never enjoyed a dinner more. I had the gnocchi special which was made with ricotta. It just melted in your mouth. Wasn't heavy at all. Outstanding doesn't say enough. This ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: We went there recently. I decided to give it a couple of weeks before posting. I wanted to see if my opinion mellowed because I was angry! We arrived and were seated promptly. Food was good,  BUT the time that it took for the food to arrive ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: I enjoyed a 3 course meal during restaurant week; 1-Pumpkin Ravioli, 2-Lamb Osco Busco and 3-Tiramisu. The overall flavors and quality was excellent, the size of the appetizer and dessert were on the small side.  Andrea, provided attentive ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: We were a party of 6 last evening, first experience at Piccolo Mondo. Everything was superb from start to finish especially our server Veronica who was very friendly while maintaining her professional skills. Will definitely return and request Veronica!

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Awesome Italian Restaurant. You have to check out this place...

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: One word: exquisite. The food was of high quality and the chef is clearly very talented, making beautiful and unique flavors. The small amount of seating only adds to its intimate ambiance, and the servers were very pleasant. Another ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: My husband and I eat often in Piccolo Mondo but decided to try the curbside delivery tonight. It was wonderful! We had branzino, fruits de mare and pizza as an appetizer. ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: I went here with another couple and we recommended the steak that has been consistently great in the past. The steak came out medium, we ordered medium rare, and sent it back. The next steak came out with some white stuff on top and was ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Would have never thought that a veal jus as a sauce for a scallops dish would make sense. But Chef Del Lima has got something with this menu item. One of the best seafood dishes I have ever had.  My wife had the gnocchi and it was light, ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Good place well run and great food

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Excellent food, friendly service, but they need more help. Waited a very long time to get the check and wasn't offered dessert until it was too late. Good selection of food on the menu. Will give it another try.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: We had a wonderful dinner here tonight. I had the Montauk swordfish and grilled Maine lobster,  it had a roasted corn puree that really made the flavors mesh well together .....my girlfriend had the jumbo shrimp with mushroom risotto, best ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Food was delicious as always and the wait staff attentive and not overbearing or rushing us out, two of the reasons we go there.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Chef Steve is excellent. Been back numerous times and everything I've had has been excellent. Two of my favorites were the salmon with the jaw dropping Cabernet butter and the ridiculously tasty Mussels appetizer.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: The food is very nice and the waitstaff, especially, the one we just were served by Ashley, is superb. The food is very nice.  The menu is varied and specials are wonderful. All staff  is professional and speedy service, without feeling rushed, is second to none to include some of the best restaurants in New York City

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Very good experience!!! Great food!!

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: We've been going to Piccolo Mondo for the past 3 or 4 years for Easter.  I have to say Roland his staff really go above and beyond to make our Easter so special!!  We found our gem and he is stuck with us every Easter.   Roland makes it so ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Food very  good,  good service.

Review Text: Nobody including us, knew this place even exists. In a small strip mall between East Northport and Commack on Jericho Tpke. We did not start off great because they do not have a great wine selection (white or red). We both settled for an OK ‚Ä¶

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Awesome atmosphere and wonderful staff, and as always...delicious food. We felt very safe. All covid related regulations seemed to be observed.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: Great food choices, not the typical offerings. Excellant value, good service.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: we go to Piccolo Mondo every Wednesday night, and love it. The food is AWESOME, and they're always willing to make custom vegan dishes for my sisters.

Name: Ristorante Italiano Piccolo Mondo
Review Text: The food and the service are amazing!! We have gone multiple times and would totally recommend trying it out!!! You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

Review Text: Cant say enough positive things about this restaurant.  The food is phenominal, service fantastic, prices $$$$, but it's worth every penny .  The venue is classy!

Review Text: Amazing restaurant I frequent often. Great wine list and specials. The menu has many items to suit just about anyone.

Review Text: I celebrated a belated 50th birthday here and it was awesome.  Outstanding staff and the food was incredible.

Review Text: This is our "go-to" place. Food is always great, service is wonderful and Roland is a great host. Beautiful bar and great ambiance. You can't go wrong here.
